name: places/ChIJPZAH9mZZwokROq8MtBOqQcs
formattedAddress: 514 E 6th St, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 514 E 6th St, New York, NY 10009-6605, USA

originalText.text: Love TAO, and love my nails. They take great care all throughout doing your nails - including the prep and filing, which I really appreciate. They check in often to make certain that you like everything throughout the whole process. I previously had a bad nail experience before coming here- so it felt great to feel taken care of. The staff is really kind and hospitable. They all seem to be good friends, and it's nice to see them laugh and have fun with each other.

text.text: Love TAO, and love my nails. They take great care all throughout doing your nails - including the prep and filing, which I really appreciate. They check in often to make certain that you like everything throughout the whole process. I previously had a bad nail experience before coming here- so it felt great to feel taken care of. The staff is really kind and hospitable. They all seem to be good friends, and it's nice to see them laugh and have fun with each other.

originalText.text: Here visiting from Colorado, and these women were so kind! Rachel made sure to get me in the same day. I got a full gel extension set with a magnet french tip. The woman who worked on them was extremely attentive and took the extra time to make sure everything looked even. They had complimentary tea and coffee and little snacks as well. Great environment, clean and professional. I had an amazing time and wish they had a Colorado location!

text.text: Here visiting from Colorado, and these women were so kind! Rachel made sure to get me in the same day. I got a full gel extension set with a magnet french tip. The woman who worked on them was extremely attentive and took the extra time to make sure everything looked even. They had complimentary tea and coffee and little snacks as well. Great environment, clean and professional. I had an amazing time and wish they had a Colorado location!

originalText.text: I recently visited Tao Nail Studio right after their one year anniversary and had an amazing experience. Rachel was incredibly detail-oriented and did an amazing job! My nails look better than the inspiration picture I showed her. The salon had a serene atmosphere and the staff were really friendly and welcoming. I highly recommend Tao Nail Studio for their meticulous service and relaxing ambiance.

text.text: I recently visited Tao Nail Studio right after their one year anniversary and had an amazing experience. Rachel was incredibly detail-oriented and did an amazing job! My nails look better than the inspiration picture I showed her. The salon had a serene atmosphere and the staff were really friendly and welcoming. I highly recommend Tao Nail Studio for their meticulous service and relaxing ambiance.

originalText.text: Ever since I found Tao Nail Salon, I’ve been a loyal customer and never looked at another nail salon. They deliver exceptional results every time I’m there, and my nails barely lift after 4 weeks of having gel on. I am very indecisive when it comes to what colors I want, but everyone’s been super accommodating and testing colors out until I find one I like! Special thanks for Rachel for accommodating last minute and far out future reservations, and this helps me a lot since my work hours are extremely long. Today, I got my nails done by Josie, and she took her time and even went over 30 minutes past closing to finish up my nails. Not once did they rush me, and I generally book later times due to my work hours. I really appreciate Tao Nail Salon, and I highly recommend them for simple to complex nail designs :)

originalText.text: I’ve been looking for a new nail salon in the East Village and I was so pleased with my first experience at Tao Nail Studio! They have a relaxing and soothing environment. Helen did an excellent and extremely thorough job on my nails. Rachel was very kind and sent me home with a sample of their cuticle oil. My gel nail extensions are going on week 3 (in photo) with no signs of peeling or breaking. Over all wonderful experience and worth the price. I will be back soon!
